seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

image.title: Image
image.description: Image to use for the first frame of the video

quality.title: quality
quality.description: Resolution of the video. Higher resolutions cost more. See pricing for details.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 second videos are only available for 360p, 540p, and 720p.

thinking_type.title: thinking_type
thinking_type.description: Prompt reasoning enhancement. Controls whether the system enhances your prompt with internal reasoning and optimization.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements in the video

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Use to generate a video that transitions from the first image to the last image. Must be used with image.

generate_audio_switch.title: Generate Audio Switch
generate_audio_switch.description: Enable AI-generated audio including BGM, SFX, and character dialogues
